title: NFL Draft Full 1st Round Reaction: Tua to Dolphins, Herbert to Chargers, Love to Packers, Lamb to Cowboys (Football 4/24)
description:
The first 32 picks of the 2020 NFL Draft have been made and the Pick Six Superfriends are here to offer their instant reactions to a very interesting 1st round. Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough take a deep dive on all the quarterback selections focusing on Joe Burrow going #1 overall to the Bengals (2:40), Tua Tagovailoa being picked #5 by the Dolphins (6:45), the Chargers following by taking Justin Herbert #6, and last but not least, the Packers surprise selection of Jordan Love at #26 (18:50). What does it signal about Aaron Rodgers' short and long-term future in Green Bay? Next, an overview of the 'virtual' aspect of this draft (34:15), as well as insight on the 6 wide receivers selected (37:00), highlighted by Henry Ruggs going off the board first, Jerry Jeudy heading to the Broncos and CeeDee Lamb heading to the Cowboys. The guys also discuss the run of offensive lineman (53:00), before issuing their winners & losers for Round 1 (55:45), before examining the best available players at the start of Day 2 (1:13:00).
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @JohnBreech, @seanjwagner
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
